hero.title: Ibi bikorwa by'ubugoyi byakugiraho weekend yose. Ohere rero.
hero.subtitle: Reba kurwanya inzu yose

hero.title: Guhindura igitekerezo cyawe kuri ukuri hamwe n'ubuyobozi bw'ibikorwa bwuzuye.
hero.subtitle: Shakisha ibikorwa byose

features.title: Ibikorwa by'Ubuyobozi bw'Ibikorwa
features.description: Kurikirana iterambere, gufata ibihe, no guhuza abakozi benshi kuri aho kumwe.

hero.title: Bona gutanga kuri urushanwa no gutanga ibintu birenga kuri ibikorwa byawe binini.
hero.subtitle: Tangira uburyo bwo gutanga

process.title: Uburyo bwo Gutanga kuri Urushanwa
process.description: Ohere ibisobanura by'ikiborwa cyawe kandi ubone gutanga kuri urushanwa kuri bakozi bafite ubumenyi mu karere kawe.

hero.title: Uhuza n'abantu b'umwuga bavuguruwe bakora ibizabaho neza.
hero.subtitle: Shakisha abantu b'umwuga

network.title: Urukurikirane rw'Abantu b'Umwuga Bavuguruwe
network.description: Abantu b'umwuga bose bavuguruwe, bafite uruhushya, kandi bafite amatangazo y'umwuga mwiza.
